segments.text: What do you like to do in your spare time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have any hobbies besides playing chess ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have any hobbies like playing tennis or things like that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes . I like playing basketball .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you tell me why you like it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because I like the feeling of cooperating with others .
segments.speaker: S2
